meanings.definition: The quality of being the best or most effective.
meanings.sent1: The optimality of his decision-making skills impressed everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She always strives for optimality in her work to achieve the best results.
meanings.sent3: The optimality of the situation made everyone laugh as they realized how perfectly everything fell into place.
meanings.sent4: The optimality of her performance on stage was like a flawless symphony, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The optimality of the solution was so clear that it stayed in everyone's minds long after the meeting ended.
